pageContext.claim: “And I think you would have had a stock market crash because we were heading in that direction. It would have been very, very ugly.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump inherited an economy that was in the middle of one of the longest post-World War II economic expansions on record. Most of the trends that Trump points to as "success" started under Obama. There is no evidence it would not have continued if Hillary Clinton had been elected and no evidence that electing a Democrat like Joe Biden would cause an economic crash.
